definitions.definition: serious and determined, especially too serious and unable to find your own actions funny:
examples: He was a very earnest young man.
These fanatics are in deadly earnest when they say they want to destroy all forms of government.

definitions.definition: When something begins in earnest, it has already started but is now being done in a serious and complete way:
examples: The election campaign has begun in earnest.
I thought he was joking - I didn't realize he was in earnest.
